languages.text: "Футфол полон греха, но даже для него истинная ересь, служение Архиврагу — редкость. Угнездившиеся в теневых кварталах культисты отмечают свои жилища знаком солнца, начертанного синим и золотым, и вершат в тайне странные ритуалы. Слабые утешают себя мыслью, что это просто слух, но я знаю — зло гнездится повсюду. И я желаю узреть возмездие".

traits.locale_text: "Футфол полон греха, но даже для него истинная ересь, служение Архиврагу — редкость. Угнездившиеся в трущобах культисты отмечают свои жилища знаком солнца, начертанного синим и золотым, и вершат в тайне странные ритуалы. Слабые утешают себя мыслью, что это просто слух, но я знаю — зло гнездится повсюду. И я желаю узреть возмездие".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Footfall is consumed by profanity, but even here, true heresy — serving the Archenemy — is a rarity. The cultists who now dwell in the Shadow Quarters mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumours, but I well know that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to see retribution."
languages.original_text: "Футфол полон греха, но даже для него истинная ересь, служение Архиврагу — редкость. Угнездившиеся в теневых кварталах культисты отмечают свои жилища знаком солнца, начертанного синим и золотым, и вершат в тайне странные ритуалы. Слабые утешают себя мыслью, что это просто слух, но я знаю — зло гнездится повсюду. И я желаю узреть возмездие".

traits.locale_text: "Footfall is consumed by sin, but even here true heresy that entails serving the Archenemy is a rarity. The cultists who now dwell in the slums mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumors, but I know well that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to witness retribution."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Footfall is consumed by sin, but even here true heresy that entails serving the Archenemy is a rarity. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumors, but I know well that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to witness retribution."

The cultists who now dwell in the Shadow Quarters mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumours, but I well know that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to see retribution."

languages.text: “落脚港已经被罪恶所吞噬，但即便是在这种地方，也极少有人为混沌大敌服务。如今，居住在阴影区的邪教徒，用带有蓝色与金色的太阳印记来标记他们的住所，还会秘密地举行古怪的仪式。软弱的人们会把这些事情当做谣言，以此自欺欺人。但我清楚地知道，邪恶就潜伏在我们周围，而且我希望能看到报应。”
languages.original_text: "Footfall is consumed by profanity, but even here, true heresy — serving the Archenemy — is a rarity. The cultists who now dwell in the Shadow Quarters mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumours, but I well know that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to see retribution."

traits.locale_text: “落脚港已经被罪恶所吞噬，但即便是在这种地方，也极少有人为混沌大敌服务。如今，居住在阴影区的邪教徒，用带有蓝色与金色的太阳印记来标记他们的住所，还会秘密地举行古怪的仪式。软弱的人们会把这些事情当做谣言，以此自欺欺人。但我清楚地知道，邪恶就潜伏在我们周围，而且我希望能看到报应。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «A Paso lo consumen las blasfemias, pero, incluso aquí, la verdadera herejía al servicio del Archienemigo es poco común. Los cultistas que habitan en los barrios bajos marcan sus moradas con un sol azul y dorado y llevan a cabo rituales en secreto. Los débiles buscan consuelo en la creencia de que estos informes no son más que rumores, pero yo sé que el mal nos acecha. Y busco venganza».
languages.original_text: "Footfall is consumed by profanity, but even here, true heresy — serving the Archenemy — is a rarity. The cultists who now dwell in the Shadow Quarters mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumours, but I well know that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to see retribution."

traits.locale_text: «A Paso lo consumen los pecados, pero, incluso aquí, la verdadera herejía al servicio del Archienemigo es poco común. Los cultistas que habitan en los barrios bajos marcan sus moradas con un sol azul y dorado y llevan a cabo rituales en secreto. Los débiles buscan consuelo en la creencia de que estos informes no son más que rumores, pero yo sé que el mal nos acecha. Y busco venganza».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「フットフォールは冒涜にまみれた場所ですが、このような場所でも渾沌の勢力に尽くすという真の異端を犯す者は滅多にいません。現在、影地域に巣食う異端崇拝者どもは、自分たちの住処に青と金で刻まれた太陽の印をつけ、奇妙な儀式を密かに行っている。弱者はこれらの報告を噂に過ぎないと流して安らぎを得ますが、私は悪が至る所に潜んでいることをよく知っています。私は報復を望みます」
languages.original_text: "Footfall is consumed by profanity, but even here, true heresy — serving the Archenemy — is a rarity. The cultists who now dwell in the Shadow Quarters mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumours, but I well know that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to see retribution."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールは罪にまみれた場所ですが、このような場所でも渾沌の勢力に尽くすという真の異端を犯す者は滅多にいません。現在、影地域に巣食う異端崇拝者どもは、自分たちの住処に青と金で刻まれた太陽の印をつけ、奇妙な儀式を密かに行っている。弱者はこれらの報告を噂に過ぎないと流して安らぎを得ますが、私は悪が至る所に潜んでいることをよく知っています。私は報復を望みます」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Footfall ist ein Sündenpfuhl, aber selbst hier gibt es nur selten wahre Ketzerei im Dienst des Erzfeindes. Die Kultisten, die jetzt in den Schattenquartieren hausen, markieren ihre Unterkünfte mit einer Sonne mit blauen und goldenen Inschriften, und sie halten insgeheim fremdartige Rituale ab. Die Schwachen finden Trost darin, diese Berichte für Gerüchte zu halten, aber ich weiß wohl, dass überall um uns herum das Böse lauert. Und ich will Vergeltung."
languages.original_text: "Footfall is consumed by profanity, but even here, true heresy — serving the Archenemy — is a rarity. The cultists who now dwell in the Shadow Quarters mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumours, but I well know that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to see retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Footfall ist ein Sündenpfuhl, aber selbst hier gibt es nur selten wahre Ketzerei im Dienst der Erzfeindin. Die Kultisten, die jetzt in den Schattenquartieren hausen, markieren ihre Unterkünfte mit einer Sonne mit blauen und goldenen Inschriften, und sie halten insgeheim fremdartige Rituale ab. Die Schwachen finden Trost darin, diese Berichte für Gerüchte zu halten, aber ich weiß wohl, dass überall um uns herum das Böse lauert. Und ich will Vergeltung."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Castel est consumée par la déchéance, mais même ici, la véritable hérésie, celle de ceux qui servent le Grand Ennemi, est rare. Les fanatiques qui arpentent désormais le Quartier des Ombres marquent leur demeure d'un soleil bleu et or, et pratiquent leurs rituels étranges dans le plus grand secret. Les faibles se rassurent en prenant ces rapports pour de simples rumeurs, mais je sais mieux que quiconque à quel point le mal rôde autour de nous. Il est temps de châtier les impies. »
languages.original_text: "Footfall is consumed by profanity, but even here, true heresy — serving the Archenemy — is a rarity. The cultists who now dwell in the Shadow Quarters mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumours, but I well know that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to see retribution."

traits.locale_text: « Castel est consumée par le péché, mais même ici, la véritable hérésie, celle de ceux qui servent le Grand Ennemi, est rare. Les fanatiques qui arpentent désormais le Quartier des Ombres marquent leur demeure d'un soleil bleu et or, et pratiquent leurs rituels étranges dans le plus grand secret. Les faibles se rassurent en prenant ces rapports pour de simples rumeurs, mais je sais mieux que quiconque à quel point le mal rôde autour de nous. Il est temps de châtier les impies. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Binliman günahkârlık kaynasa da Şerbaşı'na hizmet eden hakiki kâfirlik, burada bile nadirdir. Gölge Mahalli'ni yurt edinen tarikatçılar, meskenlerini mavi ve altın rengi bir güneş sembolüyle işaretleyip tuhaf, gizli ayinler tertiplermiş. Aklı evveller bu havadisleri söylentiden ibaret sayıp teselli buluyor, bense kötülüğün etrafımızda kol gezdiğini çok iyi biliyor ve o sinsilerin cezalarını çektiklerini görmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Footfall is consumed by profanity, but even here, true heresy — serving the Archenemy — is a rarity. The cultists who now dwell in the Shadow Quarters mark their abodes with a sun inscribed in blue and gold, and perform strange rituals in secret. The weak find solace in believing these reports to be rumours, but I well know that evil lurks all around us. And I wish to see retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman günahkârlık kaynıyor ama burada bile gerçek kâfirlik, Şerbaşı'na hizmet etme nadir görülür. Gölge Mahali'ndeki tarikatçılar yaşadıkları yerleri mavi ve altın rengi bir güneş sembolüyle işaretliyor ve tuhaf ve gizli ayinler gerçekleştiriyorlar. Aklen zayıf olanlar bu raporların yalnızca söylenti olduğunu düşünüyor ama ben kötülüğün etrafımızda kol gezdiğini çok iyi biliyorum ve onların cezalarını çektiklerini görmek istiyorum."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
